A classic blob with a lot of deformations.

[![screenshot](TorturedBlob.png)](https://github.com/nmbr73/Shadertoys/blob/main/BlobShader/TorturedBlob.fuse)


A nice example of the use of the mat3

```
 //**** mat3 ****
 typedef struct
  {
  float3 r0, r1, r2;
  } mat3;
```
Have fun
